content.data: The User Created Standard Wizard is a quick way to make  most  UCS's. There are three types of UCS's:

Add (Link) A Part : This type of UCS allows you to add a Part/Operation that is linked to another Assembly, Opening, another Part, or another Operation. 
 
 
 Modify A Part : This type of UCS allows you to modify a selected Part /Operation. 
 
 
 Delete A Part : This type of UCS allows you to delete a selected Part/Operation.
Add (Link) A Part : This type of UCS allows you to add a Part/Operation that is linked to another Assembly, Opening, another Part, or another Operation.
Add (Link) A Part : This type of UCS allows you to add a Part/Operation that is linked to another Assembly, Opening, another Part, or another Operation.
Modify A Part : This type of UCS allows you to modify a selected Part /Operation.

Delete A Part : This type of UCS allows you to delete a selected Part/Operation.
Delete A Part : This type of UCS allows you to delete a selected Part/Operation.
